Package index

All functions

boxplot_genotype_phenotype()
Generate boxplots for genotype-phenotype data
combine_plots()
Function to combine multiple ggplot objects into a single gtable object
computeLDclusterByChr()
Compute LD matrix for a cluster
computeLDclusters()
Compute LD matrix for clusters
convertGenoBi2Numeric()
Convert a habmap object to a numeric matrix
convertLDclusters2Haps()
Convert LD clusters to haplotypes and calculate the frequency of each haplotype combination
create_dirs()
Create directories for haplotype combination boxplots
create_ld_plot()
Function to create LD plot and integrate with SNP positions
create_unique_result_folder()
Create a unique result folder for HaplotraitR
diamond_annots()
Get diamond ggplot layer.
evaluate_test_group0()
Evaluate haplotype combinations versus group 0 in each trait
extract_hapmap()
Extract hapmap data for significant SNPs
find_nearby_snps()
Find nearby SNPs to a given SNP list assuming they are in the same chromosome
generateHapCombBoxPlots()
Generate and save haplotype combination boxplots
getDistClusters()
Get haplotype clusters from GWAS and hapmap data
getDistClustersByChr()
Get Distance clusters from GWAS and hapmap data By chromosome
getHapCombSamples()
Get samples for a haplotype combination
getLDclusters()
Cluster SNPs based on LD matrices
getSNPcombTables()
Get SNP combinations sample tables
get_config()
Get a configuration parameter
get_pheno_geno()
Get the phenotype and genotype data
ggplot_ld()
Ggplot linkage disequilibrium
merge_with_list_name()
Merge a list of data frames with a list name
plotCombMatrix()
Plot Haplotype Combinations Matrix
plotHapCombBoxPlot()
Plotting Haplotype Combination Boxplot for specific SNP
plotLDCombMatrix()
Plot LD and Haplotype with Combination Matrix
plotLDForClusters()
Plot LD heatmap from LDs Info table
plotLDheatmap()
Plotting LD Heatmap for a Specific Haplotype
plot_snp_positions()
Function to plot SNP positions
readGWAS()
Read GWAS results file with specified columns and FDR calculation
readHapmap()
Read hapmap file into R
readVCF()
Read a VCF file
saveTTestResultsToFile()
Convert t-test results to a data frame and save to a file
set_config()
Set configuration parameters for HaploTraitR
testSNPcombs()
Calculate the p-value for a SNP combinations
